name: Escape from Alcatraz
description:
Created for Ludum Dare jam 36 with a team of 2, this is a simple game where you need to help prisoners escape from Alcatraz prison. You'll do this be firing them from a catapult, trying to land them on a nearby island.

First, you will try to land a mattress onto the island. Then try to get as many prisoners onto the island as you can before the guards stop you (in 2 minutes). You'll get bonus points if you manage to land them on the mattress*.

*There is a current bug which can cause landing on the bed to not register correctly.
